45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Thauban, the freed slave of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ), reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:He who visits the sick continues to remain in the fruit garden of Paradise until he returns

chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Visiting The Sick
